}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *Wi-Fi/Bluetooth PCIe Mini Card Module :802.11b/g/n + Bluetooth 4.0/3.0 + HS :up to 150 Mbps and 2/3 Mbps EDR :[[Realtek]] RTL8723AE Chipset
[[AzureWave Wireless Adapters]] *[[AzureWave AW-NB114H]] - Wireless LAN Adapter :[[Realtek]] RTL8723AE Combo Mini Card (802.11b/g/n) :Subsystem ID: 13d3:3394 (BT USB) :'''MSI''' CX70 2QF, BT OUI: 28:C2:DD
==Links of Interest== *[https://techship.se/products/azurewave-aw-nb114h-wifi-bluetooth/ On '''techship.se'''] :[https://techship.se/download/do/azurewave-aw-nb114h-data-sheet/ Datasheet showing PCI ID, subsystem, and USB ID for BT portion] :BT USB ID noted as 13d3:3394 *[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=2194870 Noted lspci output on '''Ubuntu Forums''']
